name: SA FICA - Company Client
description: FICA-compliant onboarding for company, trust, and partnership clients in South Africa

checklistTemplate.name: SA FICA - Company Client Onboarding
checklistTemplate.description: FICA Schedule 3 compliance checklist for company, trust, and partnership clients

items.name: Verify CIPC registration
items.description: Obtain the company's CIPC registration certificate or equivalent

items.name: Verify registered address
items.description: Obtain proof of the company's registered address

items.name: Identify directors/trustees
items.description: Identify all directors, trustees, or partners

items.name: Verify beneficial ownership
items.description: Identify and verify all individuals with >= 25% ownership or control

items.name: Complete risk assessment
items.description: Assess the entity's ML/TF risk rating based on FICA Schedule 3

items.name: Verify source of funds
items.description: For high-risk entities or transactions above the prescribed threshold, obtain source of funds documentation
